t a week ago i had to

you said to black bear that he doesn't know you he dis=

don't think that is the case at all. i still don't have a prob=
lem with
you either. all i ever wanted to do is talk about the research you=

were doing.

I now have 2 frank's boxes (the GHOSTMAN 3 and FB#33) to do m=
y
research. (btw.. i thanks you a bunch already frank.. so thank you again)=


Steve, you come across as an expert is all i am saying. that is why i
con=
tacted you. "boxmaster estraordinaire" is it? For you to say "who
is this g=
uy?" and cause problems for a mutual friend is absurd. so..
for you and eve=
ryone to know a little about me...

oct 22 i turn 33 years old. I have been=
 interested in the box
technology for a few years now. i have been doing pa=
ranormal
investigations for 19 years now and took a 3 year break (which is =
when
you popped up on the scene.) Now i'm back and hitting it hard again
an=
d want to be able to use the best equipment that money can't buy.

Frank do=
esn't even pretend to be an expert nor does he expect his name
to be mentio=
ned every time an article is published. anyways.. i
probably said more than=
 i should have already.

bear... i'm up for that duel.. sounds fun...lol be=
st one wins a
"certificate of expertification" sign by the us president... =
lol

btw.. one rule bear... no cutting and pasting clips together to make
o=
ne up. haha

--jon
